value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Nifl, god of ice, hear me... It is your
child, Fjorm, who bows in prayer...$k$pAs an offering, I bring you my
flesh. As the vessel, I bring you
a divine weapon...$k$pOne that has come a great distance
and has the power to rule all worlds.$k$pI beg you, hear my prayer. We
seek the strength to tame the
savage flame.$k$pWe seek to quench the
unquenchable, to kill
the undying.$k$pFill this vessel with your power...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|In my name...$k$pWe are bound by contract.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|Hrk...$k$pI... I'm... It's...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fjorm, are you...all right? Are you
getting sick? You're...shivering!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I'm fine. Just...a little chill...
That's all$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A...chill? On a nice, warm summer
day like today?$k$pYou're sure you're not sick?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It's... I'm fine. It will pass soon
enough... Come now, Ylgr. It's
time to go.$k$p$EFace_Anger|...$k$p...Time to go.$k$pI chose this. When I forged the
contract, I knew this day would
come eventually...$k$pI now give myself over to Nifl,
the great god of ice, as I've long
known I must...$k$p

$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*gasp*$k$pTh-this feeling...$k$pIt's like when I performed the rite...
As if the air is freezing around me...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|$w0|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you!$k$pYou are...Nifl...the god of ice herself...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Silence. You are too eager to claim
me as your god. The god of ice is
now only a story told by mortals.$k$pI am no more free of the flow
of nature than is the land or
the water.$k$pYoung mortal... Child born of
my bloodline...$k$pYou offered yourself to me.$k$pYour bond is absolute. There is no
altering the oath.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Of course... Then, it is as I had begun
to expect. The time has come.$k$pI will honor my vow. To break an oath
to a god would be unforgivable.$k$pBut please, Great Nifl, might I keep
my life? Will you...spare me?$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p...You regret your oath, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I— What?$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|The emotions that rule you mortals
are fickle and ever-wavering.$k$pEven now your heart trembles...
What disturbs it so?$k$pThe fear of death? Regret for your
vow to me? No...$k$pEven now, knowing all you know,
you would do precisely the same,
would you not?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|...I would.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|The mortal pursuit of everlasting life
is frivolous. Insignificant as you are,
you still wish to live on... Why?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pMy companions and I are engaged
in a desperate conflict yet again.$k$pEveryone is fighting with everything
they have to give... If I were to leave
them now...$k$pIt would feel like I had abandoned
them—all of my friends.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I— I'm sorry. Please, forgive me...$k$pI am ashamed for making
such excuses.$k$p$EFace|In truth, my motivation is selfish
at its core.$k$pThere is someone...someone who
I cannot bear leaving...$k$pIf I could spend a little more time...
Any more time...$k$pThat is why I want to live.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Be silent.$k$pYour mouth runs as if it has sprung
a leak. I do not care for it.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I apologize...$k$p$EFace|That is...all I had to say.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|I see.$k$pThen, as you swore, you will give
yourself over to me?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I will.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What... What happens now?$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|I have not come here to kill you
or take your life, Fjorm.$k$pA foul flame, having long been little
more than embers, has been relit.
It must be destroyed.$k$pIf you want to live, complete this
task—for the sake of this beloved
of yours if nothing else.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What must I do?$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Be my champion. Destroy the god
of flame, Múspell.$k$pDefeat Múspell and his champion,
and your life will again be your own
to misspend however you please...$k$p$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|
